descriptionHtml:
[list]
[*]This mod prevents the player from depleting ore veins, now you can mine the same rocks for as long as you want.
[*]Getting ore takes two times longer than vanilla.
[*]You can chop wood for as long as you want, I removed the MaxResourcePerActivation check from the woodchop blocks.
[*]Stalhrim is the only exception, the mod increments the amount given to the player and thus the time required to clear a deposit but that's it.
[*]If you don't have the Dragonborn DLC then you don't need to load the .esp file.
[*]Mod is localized to english and spanish.
[/list]

[b]If you are interested, you can check my other mods.[/b]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24239]FPS Counter[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23402]Horse gallop endurance[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23664]Windowed Mode Relocator[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24028]Strong Boxes On Alchemy Labs And Arcane Enchanters[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24415]Winmm Plugin Loader[/url]
[/list]
[b]Best regards.[/b]
author: Pharago
